overview: Raging Stallion's latest fisting flick has got to be the greasiest, filthiest, most rosebud-laden fist pic we've ever released. Arms up to elbows, double paw stretching, grease coated super handball!! With Raging Stallion Exclusives MATTHIEU PARIS, BILLY BERLIN, MARC LASALLE, and featuring LEE HEYFORD, this balls to the wall, open canyon hole of a movie will leave your mouth gaping as wide as the asses splashed across your TV screen.
title: Fist and Shout Part 2
